name: VCO with waveshaping
description: Simple VCO based on OG disting algorithms. Outputs Triangle/Saw, Square/Pulse, Sub-octave Square, and Sine waves. Shared Waveshape parameter controls shape/pulsewidth. Supports linear through-zero FM and oscillator sync.

parameters.name: Waveshape
parameters.description: Sets the wave shape/pulsewidth for Triangle/Saw, Square/Pulse, and Sine outputs.

parameters.name: Octave
parameters.description: Adjusts the VCO tuning in octaves.

parameters.name: Transpose
parameters.description: Adjusts the VCO tuning in semitones.

parameters.name: Fine tune
parameters.description: Adjusts the VCO tuning in cents.

parameters.name: Oversampling
parameters.description: Enables oversampling to reduce aliasing noise at higher frequencies.

parameters.name: FM scale
parameters.description: Sets the Hz/V sensitivity of the linear FM input.

parameters.name: Triangle/saw amplitude
parameters.description: Sets the amplitude of the triangle/saw output (pre-gain).

parameters.name: Square/pulse amplitude
parameters.description: Sets the amplitude of the square/pulse output (pre-gain).

parameters.name: Sub amplitude
parameters.description: Sets the amplitude of the sub-octave output (pre-gain).

parameters.name: Sine amplitude
parameters.description: Sets the amplitude of the sine output (pre-gain).

parameters.name: Triangle/saw gain
parameters.description: Sets the level of the triangle/saw output.

parameters.name: Square/pulse gain
parameters.description: Sets the level of the square/pulse output.

parameters.name: Sub gain
parameters.description: Sets the level of the sub-octave output.

parameters.name: Sine gain
parameters.description: Sets the level of the sine output.

parameters.name: Pitch input
parameters.description: The pitch CV input (1V/octave).

parameters.name: Shape input
parameters.description: The waveshape CV input (±5V = ±100% range).

parameters.name: Sync input
parameters.description: The oscillator sync input (rising edge resets phase).

parameters.name: FM input
parameters.description: The linear FM input.

parameters.name: Triangle/saw output
parameters.description: The output bus for the triangle/saw signal.

parameters.name: Triangle/saw mode
parameters.description: Add/Replace mode for the triangle/saw signal.

parameters.name: Square/pulse output
parameters.description: The output bus for the square/pulse signal.

parameters.name: Square/pulse mode
parameters.description: Add/Replace mode for the square/pulse signal.

parameters.name: Sub output
parameters.description: The output bus for the sub-octave signal.

parameters.name: Sub output mode
parameters.description: Add/Replace mode for the sub-octave signal.

parameters.name: Sine output
parameters.description: The output bus for the sine signal.

parameters.name: Sine output mode
parameters.description: Add/Replace mode for the sine signal.

parameters.name: 0 2 0 Enables oversampling, to reduce aliasing noise at higher frequencies. The options are “None”, “2x”, and “4x”. FM scale
parameters.description: Sets the Hz/V sensitivity of the linear FM input.

parameters.name: 0.00 10.00 10.00 V Sets the amplitude of the sub-octave output (before it’s affected by the gain). Sine amplitude
parameters.description: Sets the amplitude of the sine output (before it’s

parameters.name: Triangle/ saw mode
parameters.description: The add/replace mode for the triangle/saw signal.

parameters.description: Sets the Hz/V sensitivity of the linear FM input.
